title: Municipal policy informed by aggregated care economy data
description: Municipal policy informed by aggregated care economy data
content:
Scenario: Municipal policy informed by aggregated care economy data
    Given thousands of residents participate in care economy
    And their care patterns generate valuable data
    When municipal policy decisions are made
    Then the municipal_elohim should provide aggregated care work data
    And policy makers should see actual patterns of care labor
    And invisible care work should be quantified at municipal scale
    And policy should be informed by real care economy patterns
    And data should reveal needs that traditional economics miss
